post.description: All ingest APIs are limited to max of 1,000 items.

patch.description:
Updates may contain full or partial data. When partial, the Id, type, last update date MUST be set in addition to changing values!

post.description: Handles a variety of single event type payloads.

type.description: The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

personId.description: The person to whom this interaction happened or who performed this interaction

attendanceEndDate.description: If needed, the date this single attendance item stopped occurring

serviceTypeId.description: If applicable, the service type ID related to this attendance

serviceTypeName.description: If applicable, the name of the name of the service type related to this attendance

attendanceTypeId.description:
If applicable in your system, the type of this attendance. This should not be used to differentiate
attendance/volunteering.

cmsGroupId.description: If applicable, the group ID attached to this attendance

eventName.description: If applicable, the name attached to the EventData for this attendance

eventId.description: If applicable, the ID attached to the EventBaseV1 for this attendance

eventOccurrenceId.description: If applicable, the ID attached to the EventOccurrenceData for this attendance

locationId.description: If applicable, the ID of the LocationBaseV1 related to this attendance

AttendanceBaseV1.description: An instance of a person attending an event

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'attendances.v1.events.attendance.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'attendances.v1.events.attendance.updated'

attributeValueId.description: The ID of the attribute value

isDeleted.description: Indicates if the attribute on this person is deleted

lastUpdateDate.description: When the attribute was last updated

type.description: The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

accountName.description: The recognizable name of the account

parentAccountId.description:
If parent-child relationships exist between accounts in your system, this should be the ID of another
DonationAccountBaseV1

DonationAccountBaseV1.description: A category/grouping/account toward which a donation is contributed.

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'donations.v1.events.account.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'donations.v1.events.account.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

personId.description: The person to whom this interaction happened or who performed this interaction

amount.description: The monetary value of the contribution in dollars and cents

accountId.description: The ID of the DonationAccountBaseV1 to which this contribution was made

softCreditPersonId.description: if multiple people should be credited for this donation, this can be the ID of another PersonBaseV1

DonationBaseV1.description:
Represents a contribution of a person applied to an account. This can be used to represent any kind of contribution
that has monetary value (e.g., donations "in-kind").

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'donations.v1.events.donation.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'donations.v1.events.donation.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

startDate.description: The date and time the event starts. If time doesn't mean anything in your system, it can be anything arbitrary.

endDate.description: The date and time the event ends. If time doesn't mean anything in your system, it can be anything arbitrary.

headcount.description:
The total number of people that attended the event by taking a physical headcount. Only set this if it makes
sense in your system.

locationId.description: The ID of the LocationBaseV1 where the event is held.

groupId.description: The ID of the CmsGroup associated with the event

eventGroupingId.description: The ID of the grouping for the event. This

eventGroupingName.description: The name of the grouping for the event

eventOccurrences.description: A collection of occurrences for this event

EventBaseV1.description: Represents a way to organize instances of an event together at a top level.

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'events.v1.events.event.created'

id.description: The unique identifier for this event occurrence

headcount.description: The headcount for this specific occurrence

lastUpdateDate.description: When this occurrence was last updated

EventOccurrenceData.description: Represents a specific occurrence of an event

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'events.v1.events.event.updated'

id.description:
The ID that represents the submission of this line-item question. If your system doesn't support this,
updates to a form submission's answers must be done all at once with 'replaceAnswers'

fieldId.description:
The ID of the line-item question. Multiple Form Answers can have the same fieldId in a payload only if they
            represent multiple selections to a multi-select (checkbox-style) question

fieldTitle.description: The question that this line-item poses

titleValue.description: If the type of the answer is any type of free-form, then the value the submitter entered

choiceId.description: If this answer field is a single-select (dropdown) question, the ID of the choice

choiceValue.description: If choiceId is set, then the user-facing value that corresponds to it

optionId.description:
If this answer field is a multi-select (checkboxes) question, the ID of the choice.
            If the answer field is a checkbox+"write-in", this can be omitted

optionValue.description: If optionId is set or the answer field is a checkbox+"write-in", the user-facing value that corresponds to it

createDate.description: When this line-item response was created

lastUpdateDate.description: When this line-item response was updated

FormAnswerV1.description: A line-item on the submission of a form for which the submitter entered a value

type.description: The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

formId.description: The ID of the form that was submitted

personId.description: The PersonBaseV1 ID of the person submitting the form. Must already exist

modifiedDate.description: When this form submission was last modified

formAnswers.description: A list of answers on this form's submission

FormResponseBaseV1.description: Represents a single submission to an existing form, not the form itself

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'formresponses.v1.events.formresponse.created'

replaceAnswers.description:
set to true to replace all answer line-items for this form response with those supplied in this payload.
Useful if form response line-items do not have an ID

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'formresponses.v1.events.formresponse.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

groupRoleName.description: The name of the role within the group

groupRoleTypeId.description: The ID of the GroupRoleTypeBaseV1 associated with this role

groupTypeId.description:
The ID of the GroupTypeBaseV1 associated with this role.
Example: groupTypeId is "leader" where roles could be "coach", "servant", "chef", "usher"

GroupRoleBaseV1.description: Represents the base data for a group role

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'groups.v1.events.grouprole.created'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

groupRoleTypeName.description: The name of the group role type

GroupRoleTypeBaseV1.description:
Represents a person's role within a PersonGroupBaseV1.
Examples: "Leader", "Assistant Leader", "Member", "Director"

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'groups.v1.events.grouproletype.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'groups.v1.events.grouproletype.updated'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'groups.v1.events.grouprole.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

groupTypeName.description: The name of the group type

GroupTypeBaseV1.description:
Represents a type of PersonGroupBaseV1 within your system.
Common examples: "Service Group", "Small Group", "Dream Team", "Audio/Visual"

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'groups.v1.events.grouptype.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'groups.v1.events.grouptype.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

address2.description: The second line of the address

isActive.description: Indicates if the location is active

parentLocationId.description: The LocationBaseV1 ID of the parent location

LocationBaseV1.description: Represents a physical location for your organization

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'locations.v1.events.location.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'locations.v1.events.location.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

memberRoleName.description: The name of the member role

isParent.description: Is a parent of a child, not hierarchy

MemberRoleBaseV1.description:
Represents the base data for a PersonBaseV1's role within a PersonFamilyBaseV1.
Examples: "Parent", "Child", "Other", "Adult Child"

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'people.v1.events.memberrole.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'people.v1.events.memberrole.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

memberTypeDescription.description: The description of the member type

MemberTypeBaseV1.description:
Represents a type of relationship between a PersonBaseV1 and your organization. Examples:
"Member", "Staff", "Regular". A person should be exactly one of these. Any more delineation can be specified
through a PersonBaseV1's AttributeDataV1

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'people.v1.events.membertype.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'people.v1.events.membertype.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

PayloadItem.description: Base class for all webhook payload items, containing common properties

type.description: The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

isDeceased.description: Indicates if the person is deceased

personGender.description: The person's gender. Should be one of "Female", "Male", "Other", or "Unknown"

avatar.description: A publicly accessible URL for an avatar of this person

neighborhood.description: The name of the person's neighborhood

membershipDate.description: The person's date of membership with your organization

isStaff.description: Indicates if the person is staff

recurringGiver.description: Indicates if the person is a recurring giver

isDeleted.description: Indicates if this record is deleted

primaryCampusId.description: The LocationBaseV1 ID of the primary campus

primaryFamilyId.description: The PersonFamilyBaseV1 ID of the primary family

memberTypeId.description: The MemberTypeBaseV1 ID of the member type

attributes.description: A collection of attributes associated with the person

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'people.v1.events.person.created'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

primaryContactId.description: The PersonBaseV1 ID of the person who is the primary contact for the family

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether the family record is deleted

people.description:
A collection of people associated with this family. On update, only the people that are included in this
list will be modified

PersonFamilyBaseV1.description: Represents the base data for a Family of people. People can be in multiple families.

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'people.v1.events.personfamily.created'

personId.description: The PersonBaseV1 ID of the person

memberRoleId.description:
The MemberRoleCreatedV1 ID of the person within this family
            
Internal examples: adult/child/etc. Defaults to 0 if omitted

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether the relationship between this Person and Family is deleted

PersonFamilyPersonRelationshipDataV1.description: Represents the relationship data between a person and a family

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'people.v1.events.personfamily.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

departmentSourceId.description: If applicable in your system, the source ID of the department

departmentName.description: If applicable in your system, the name of the department

groupStatus.description: The status of the group. Must be one of "NotFound", "Unknown", "Inactive", "Active", or "Pending"

locationId.description: The LocationBaseV1 ID of the location associated with this group

groupTypeId.description: The GroupTypeBaseV1 ID of the group type

people.description: A collection of people in the group. On update, only the people that are included in this list will be modified

PersonGroupBaseV1.description:
Represents the base data for a Group of people. This could be a "virtual" group, or a real, physical group. It's
flexible enough that any logical collection of people can be associated with each other

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'groups.v1.events.persongroup.created'

personId.description: The PersonBaseV1 ID of the person

isLeader.description: Indicates if the person is a leader

startDate.description: The date on which a person's group membership started

endDate.description: The date on which a person's group membership ended

groupRoleId.description: The GroupRoleBaseV1 ID of the group role

lastUpdateDate.description: When this record was last updated

isDeleted.description:
Indicates if the person is deleted from the group. This will automatically be set if EndDate is
in the past

PersonGroupPersonV1.description: Represents a person within a group

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'groups.v1.events.persongroup.updated'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'people.v1.events.person.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

personId.description: The person to whom this interaction happened or who performed this interaction

when.description: What date and time this person was registered/waitlisted/canceled.

signupId.description:
Can be null. The ID of the common thing that was submitted by all those who registered/waitlisted/canceled.
If used, it must be the ID of a SignupBaseV1.

RegistrationBaseV1.description:
A model representing that a person has been registered, waitlisted, or canceled for some SignupBaseV1.
Each time a person is registered, waitlisted, or canceled for the same Signup, a new ID should be used.

kind.description:
One of "registered", "waitlisted", or "canceled", describing the kind of registration action that was performed.
Once a RegistrationBaseV1 record has been created, the Kind cannot be changed.

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'signups.v1.events.registration.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'signups.v1.events.registration.updated'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

archived.description: Indicates if the signup is archived

eventId.description: The ID of an associated EventBaseV1

SignupBaseV1.description:
Represents the base data for a signup. This is something for which someone can "sign up", whatever that means in
your system. It can be as simple as an event for which you record "expressing interest".

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'signups.v1.events.signup.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'signups.v1.events.signup.updated'

isAcceptable.description: Indicates if the payload is acceptable

isValid.description: Indicates if the payload is valid

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'test.v1.healthy'
The type discriminator for the payload item

lastUpdateDate.description: When the item was last updated

personId.description: The person to whom this interaction happened or who performed this interaction

attendanceEndDate.description: If needed, the date this single attendance item stopped occurring

serviceTypeId.description: If applicable, the service type ID related to this attendance

serviceTypeName.description: If applicable, the name of the name of the service type related to this attendance

attendanceTypeId.description:
If applicable in your system, the type of this attendance. This should not be used to differentiate
attendance/volunteering.

cmsGroupId.description: If applicable, the group ID attached to this attendance

eventName.description: If applicable, the name attached to the EventData for this attendance

eventId.description: If applicable, the ID attached to the EventBaseV1 for this attendance

eventOccurrenceId.description: If applicable, the ID attached to the EventOccurrenceData for this attendance

locationId.description: If applicable, the ID of the LocationBaseV1 related to this attendance

VolunteerBaseV1.description: An instance of a person volunteering for an event

type.description: For webhook payload value MUST BE 'attendances.v1.events.volunteer.created'
For webhook payload value MUST BE 'attendances.v1.events.volunteer.updated'

id.description: Unique system identifier for the event, not to be confused with id of the data item.

timestamp.description: Event time, formatted as https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601 ex: "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ"

data.description: The data payload of the event

WebhookPayload.description: Represents the standard webhook payload envelope

HMAC.description: HMAC Authorization header using API key and signature (e.g., API_KEY:SIGNATURE)
HMAC.name: Authorization
